page.title: 11Employment-Slyne-with-Hest
page.content: Most people who live in Slyne-with-Hest work in Morecambe,Lancaster and Heysham .Many people are employed at the two nuclear power stations at Heysham .Some people are working on the new gas field being developed in Morecambe Bay.A lot of people who live in Slyne-with-Hest work at Lancaster University.There are many professional people living in the village,including doctors,dentists, solicitors and teachers.Very few people work in Slyne-with-Hest, it is a mainly residential area.Those people who do work in Slyne-with-Hest are employed in service industries such as shops,caring for the elderly and in education.
